high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to the bed
Pick up the brown and tan patterned pillow that is sitting on the bed
Turn left and walk to the end of the desk in front of you; that part of the desk that is to the immediate left of the plant
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a lamp

high_descs: Go forward to the desk, hang a right and go to the bed.
Pick up the cushion that is on the bed.
Turn around, go to the right to the table with the lamp on it.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a cushion and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and walk forward to the pillow on the bed.
Pick up the pillow from the bed.
Turn left and walk forward to the lamp on the right side of the desk in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a desk lamp.
